name: OpenBookQA
summary: A multiple-choice QA dataset of elementary science questions that require combining a core fact (from a given small "open book" of science facts) with broad common knowledge​:contentReference[oaicite:70]{index=70}. It has 5,957 questions with 4 answer choices each, focusing on science concepts and facts​:contentReference[oaicite:71]{index=71}.
size: 5,957 questions (4,957 train, 500 dev, 500 test)​:contentReference[oaicite:72]{index=72}; each question has 4 options.
download: AI2 OpenBookQA site (AI2 leaderboards) or HuggingFace `openbookqa`.
notes: Along with questions, an "open book" of 1,326 science facts (mostly from elementary science textbooks) is provided. Successful QA often requires using one of those facts plus additional commonsense or knowledge. The dataset tests multi-hop reasoning combining a known fact and contextual reasoning. Part of the ARC/OpenBookQA leaderboard challenges.
